source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a scenic, tilted aerial view of a vast expanse of deep teal water under a partly cloudy sky. A bright light source illuminates the scene from above, creating a hazy glow. The shot focuses on the scenery, and there is no specific subject motion to describe.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This video presents a scenic, tilted aerial view of a vast expanse of deep teal water under a partly cloudy sky. A bright light source illuminates the scene from above, creating a hazy glow. Two birds or flying objects can be seen above the sea, though they are difficult to discern due to the distance. source_caption_data.final_caption: This video presents a scenic, tilted aerial view of a vast expanse of deep teal water under a partly cloudy sky. A bright light source illuminates the scene from above, creating a hazy glow. Two birds or flying objects can be seen above the sea, though they are difficult to discern due to the distance. Additionally, the ripples on the water exhibit slight movement, adding a subtle dynamic element to the scene.

generated_critique: The caption correctly identifies the general scene but fails to describe the motion with the required specificity and objectivity. It uses speculative language ("Two birds or flying objects") and expresses uncertainty ("difficult to discern"), which directly violates the instructions. Instead of just noting their presence, the caption should have described their specific flight paths; for instance, one bird could be flying steadily from left to right across the upper portion of the frame while the second, smaller bird circles in the distance. The description of the water's movement as "slight movement" is too vague. A better description would specify the nature and direction of the motion, such as "small, consistent waves travel from the right side of the frame towards the left." Furthermore, the caption completely omits the motion of the camera itself, which, in an aerial shot like this, is a primary component of the action. For example, the camera could be slowly panning to the right, causing the clouds and the distant horizon to drift leftward. Finally, the phrase "adding a subtle dynamic element to the scene" is an interpretive comment and should be removed in favor of a direct, factual description of the movement.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video presents a scenic, tilted aerial view of a vast expanse of deep teal water under a partly cloudy sky. A bright light source illuminates the scene from above, creating a hazy glow. Two birds are visible; one flies steadily from left to right across the upper portion of the frame, while the second, smaller bird circles in the distance. Small, consistent waves travel from the right side of the frame towards the left. The camera slowly pans to the right, causing the clouds and the distant horizon to drift leftward.
